meaningMnemonic: Something that is <kanji>near</kanji> <kanji>period</kanji> <kanji>like</kanji> is very <vocabulary>contemporary</vocabulary>. But if it looks like it's from a period not near the one you're in... throw it away! It isn't <vocabulary>modern</vocabulary> enough to touch your hands!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
